alert.note: Alert for Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:24PM CDT until May 17 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL PERKINS AND SOUTHWESTERN KEITH COUNTIES... At 823 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Brule, or 11 miles southeast of Big Springs, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 806 PM MDT, half dollar size hail was reported 3 miles northeast of Big Springs. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Grant, Brule, Madrid, Wild Horse Spring and Megeath. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 56 and 85. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 111 and 124. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
